patthana16.30:1.1: Savitakkasavicāraṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasavitakkasavicāro nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā pannarasa …pe… avigate pannarasa.
patthana16.30:2.1: Savitakkasavicāraṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naavitakkavicāramatto nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā aṭṭhavīsa, ārammaṇe aṭṭhavīsa, adhipatiyā ekūnavīsa …pe… purejāte āsevane ekūnavīsa …pe… avigate aṭṭhavīsa.
